1.speaker: Resources/Mr_Pug.png
1.text:
MAYDAY, MAYDAY! Commander P. Ug speaking!
Does any- *zrkkk* -one hear *zrrk* me?
PLEASE *zrrrkkk* 
- Signal Lost -

1.speaker: Resources/Mr_Trump.png
1.text:
HAHAHAHAHA!! YOU WILL NEVER GET ME!
I am the Trumpinator!
I will destroy you like a little ant!
Here, have a little taste of my army!!!

1.speaker: Resources/instructor.png
1.text:
Go destroy every ship that crosses your path!
Press P if you need a pppause and Arrow Up to buy a new Ship if you got the money!
